title: Candidate A detail fact Candidate B emotion appeal

content.question: During a political debate, Candidate A expresses detailed facts on an important issue. Candidate B responds with an emotional appeal on the same issue. Which method of persuasion is each of the candidates using?

choices.label: Candidate A is using the peripheral route, and Candidate B is using the central route.
Candidate A is using the peripheral route, and Candidate B is using the door-in-the-face technique.
Candidate A is using the central route, and Candidate B is using the peripheral route.
Candidate A is using the central route, and Candidate B is using the foot-in-the-door technique.

content.answer: Candidate A is using the central route, and Candidate B is using the peripheral route.
